data.title: DC Madam: ABC News "Did A Tremendous Disservice To The American People"
data.text:
The latest email from Deborah Jeane Palfrey, aka the ‘DC Madam,’ mentions her deal with ABC News:

Simultaneously, during the period when the decision to take the records off the market was made, Senior Executive Producer Rhonda Schwartz for Brian Ross, of ABC News, in New York approached Mr. Sibley and me about the records. Told ABC News “does not pay for information”, they nonetheless would incur in our circumstance the expense of culling the billing invoices for possible witnesses, leads and general information, which ultimately could be beneficial to my defense.

WORK SMARTER - LEARN, GROW AND BE INSPIRED.
